gobblin.runtime.std

Class FilteredJobLifecycleListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.runtime.std.FilteredJobLifecycleListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JobCatalogListener, JobExecutionStateListener, JobLifecycleListener, JobSpecSchedulerListener

    public class FilteredJobLifecycleListener
extends Object
implements JobLifecycleListener
    A listener that can delegate to another JobLifecycleListener only callbacks that are relevant to a specific Jobs.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface gobblin.runtime.api.JobLifecycleListener
